name: Martian Combat
description:
This is a short Mars base escape level, built on unity with interior and exterior locations. multiple enemies to defeat.

Contribution to Project:                                                                                                                                       My contribution was level design, all the scripts were already done for me. I built the level using a free unity store asset pack. I also design two of my own assets, a vending machine that the player can interact with and a key card that the player uses to access key locations.

While working on this project I learnt many things about level design, ways to lead the player to points of interest and ways to stop the player from going the wrong way.
